name: David Wilson
text: Had a great experience with James. He lowered my payment for me and did a great job! If you are in the market for a vehicle at a great price go see all American Ford

name: Will Lee
text: Great experience with salesman Dink Tucker. Polite, not overbearing on getting the car sold, and very personable. Car was as advertised, great communication throughout the decision to purchase my first new vehicle. Thanks again!

name: shae tindall
text: Chelsea Smith was great! She was able to get me a better deal than my bank! She was the absolute sweetest!

name: Alex Hyde
text: This was my first time buying a car and it could not have gone any better! Dink Tucker is a pro and he now has a life long customer!  You will not be disappointed if you visit , and make sure to tell him Alex sent you!

name: Raymond Ashley
text: I recently purchased a 2020 Dodge Durango. My experience was great. I drove further than I wanted but it was worth it. Great service by all. Really great interest rate. I would purchase there again. You should too.

name: Alice Robinson
text: I always get great service and treated kind when I take my 2018 ecosport in for oil change!! Thank u!!

name: Eddie Smith
text: The guys in parts are great ,very helpful and accommodating! Friends as well, awesome!!

name: shacklferd rust
text: Friendly environment and knowledge staff very fair pricing

name: Jr Reid
text: Huge shout out to Alex and Jeremy for making buying a car so easy

name: Scott Cosner
text: Fantastic experience with Dink and Chelsea.

name: Cheryl Adams
text: Extremely AWESOME dealership.  The best employees who go above and beyond.  Very highly recommended

name: Lanna Hogeland
text: Great service, thank you James Russell!

name: Michael Sanchez
text: I want to publicly give praise to the salesman Alex Sanchez! He is quite possibly one of the best salesmen I've ever had to buy a car from. He showed me different options based on what I asked for, and steered me in the right direction for me! Best attitude I've ever seen and had the best manners! His parents must be proud! Give that man a raise!! I will definitely be coming back just for him.

name: Blooms & Branches
text: Wish there was more stars to give Alex Sanchez, he helped me from the time I walked in till I walked out, he helped find a vehicle that fits all my needs and one that I would not be paying the rest of my life on. Very easy guy to work with! Definitely much different from other car salesmen Alex likes to make sure his customers are satisfied with no worries when they leave. Will definitely be back to see him again! Thanks Alex keep up the hard work buddy.

name: Zion (NautiB3ar)
text: Great Staff! Ask for Alex Alex Sanchez, he helped me find something in my price range. Although I didn't make a purchase, I know where I'm going when I get financially ready. Wonderful service, good conversation, informative, and a overall rad experience. 20/10 would recommend

name: Victoria Golden
text: I stopped by this lot really needing a lot of guidance. I had an idea about what I wanted but needed a little bit more information before I made my decision. Alex was a great help. He was great to work with and he helped me get a really great deal on a vehicle. These kinds of things always stress me out and he made it so easy. Highly recommend.

name: Nikki Shirley
text: Totally satisfied with the service. I don't know much about buying cars, but Alex was incredibly kind and patient with me. He explained how the process worked, and helped me find what would be best for my family. Plus he was able to work with me in financing. 15/10. I will not go anywhere else.

name: Matthew Brooks
text: What can I say except, "wow!" If I had a dollar for every time a car salesman tried to give me the short end of the stick I'd be completely broke because I only work with the best. And the best is Alex Sanchez. Truly unbelievable service the likes of which have never been seen before.

name: Maggie Allinder
text: I would have to say that my experience here was absolutely delightful! Not only was the staff kind, but Mr. Sanchez listened to me and my specific needs, helping me find a car that fit ME! I had a budget set and Mr. Sanchez was so kind as to help me right away! It's so hard to find a salesman who actually cares for his clients. I will never forget this!

name: Emily Kirbow
text: Cannot recommend this dealership enough! Amazing staff that actually care and want to put you in the right vehicle you will love! If you’re planning to go, make triple sure you ask for Alex Sanchez! He will get you in the right car within your budget!

name: KittenCrisp
text: All American helped me out with my first time getting a car. Alex Sanchez did an AMAZING job working with me and my (admittedly) terrible credit. He showed me cars within my budget, and made it possible for me to have the car I wanted. They even offer a free oil change with a purchase, which is amazing if you're low on funds and it's about that time. Even then, it would've only have been a little over $14, which I think is great. Everyone is so friendly and kind, and is willing to work with you. I definitely recommend them if you're looking to trade in or purchase a new car!

name: Janet Hernandez
text: Alex was a great help to me and my family! Highly recommend him to anyone looking for a new vehicle. Will definitely return when I'm buying again!!

name: Alejandro Sanchez
text: Dank place for dank deals. This place is the best out there. Management is great, they worked with me and my situation. I highly recommend, Alex, my salesman. That boy was kind and caring and really heard me out.

name: Jordan Simon
text: This dealership is amazing and I attribute my experiences there to Alex Sanchez. He went above and beyond in helping me find a truck for my sweet daughter. He was very patient and didn’t try to upsell me anything we didn’t need. I definitely recommend going here and asking for him!!

name: Alan Whitehead
text: Just wanted to let you know, should you visit this dealership, please seek out Alex Sanchez. He is more of a long time friend than a car salesman. Absolutely no pressure whatsoever. I appreciate such when I shop for a vehicle.

name: Jason Keller
text: This place has some of the best prices out there! I highly recommend this place and also Alex Sanchez as your salesman! Could not have been more satisfied with my experience here!

name: Andrea Zamora
text: Hands down the best dealership. They have the best staff. If you are not sure what kind of vehicle you want, the sales people will go out of there way to find the perfect car for you! If you are looking for a new car definitely go check them out.

name: Noman Irfan
text: Alex Sanchez was by the most friendly and informative salesmen I have ever met in my life. Not only was he able to make the process easy to do, he also made sure I left with a car that I have yet to have any complaints about. I can't recommend this place and himself enough!

name: Noman Irfan
text: I've had the pleasure of working with Alex Sanchez to finally get a car at last! Not only did he make the process simple, he was able to explain features very thoroughly to me despite me not knowing anything about cars! I would highly recommend asking for Alex next time you are here!

name: Tommy M
text: If y'all are looking for a great deal with great service All American CDJR is definitely the place to go. The sales people are pleasant and knowledgeable. They ALL will go the extra mile for any customer.

name: Papa James
text: I went in asking about a truck , I took my trade in truck with me . It was looked at. I waited for a few days ,asked a few times to see what it was worth . It depends on what you are buying is what I found out. I did go somewhere else to buy a new truck . The trade number I got was way low compared to every other dealer I took the truck too. Own 3 dodge trucks,  super high credit score, bought a 2019 ram 3500 new from another dealer .

name: Dylan McCombs
text: James was a huge help in me buying my first car! Highly recommend!

name: Alex Binion
text: I had a great experience here and know that I will be back. They take care of their clientele, and Alex Sanchez was a huge help! Thanks again.

name: Jeffrey Kirbow
text: All American CDJR is the place to go to find a new or used vehicle. I spent a great few hours with a great salesman, Alex Sanchez. He helped me find what I was looking for and was very knowledgeable about the inventory. If you want to be treated right and fair, go see Alex at All American.

name: Tina Cole
text: Great experience.  Our sales person was Alex Sanchez.  He worked with us to get the payment where we needed it and worked with us on our down payment.  We will never use another car dealership other than All American Ford and we will always ask for Alex.

name: Fallen Angel
text: Buy vehicles from here hands down. I highly reccomend the place, great staff, great attitudes, very knowledgeable about the vehicles. I reccomend asking for Alex Sanchez, he was immensely helpful in my search for my new car and I wont be going anywhere else for one. Thanks guys

name: Tamica Stewart
text: You won't find a better associate than Caleb Hollingsworth. He is friendly, knowledgeable, and polite. He really is excellent, and  goes above and beyond!

name: Brent Campbell
text: I usually don’t go out of the way to give reviews, but I wanted to make sure Alex Sanchez gets some more recognition for his awesome work!

name: Seth Noblitt
text: Had a great experience thanks to Caleb Hollingsworth. I recommend him to anyone.

name: Kris Tanner
text: Caleb Hollingsworth is the best salesman! My husband was in the dealership having a recall replaced. Caleb was knowledgeable and helpful concerning purchase options for our family. Thank you, Caleb!

name: fernanda perez
text: Caleb Hollingsworth is extremely helpful and so nice. I will definitely be purchasing from him when the time comes.

name: antonio tutt
text: Looking for the best customer service ask for Alex he will provide the best customer experience for you. Be sure to ask for him highly recommended!

name: Sunnie Reagan
text: Caleb did a great job and had excellent customer service. Great experience!

name: Robert Eaton
text: Staff was great.  Dodge offers many rebates.  I couldn't find a dodge truck that met what I was looking for but I did end up getting a great deal on a F-150.

name: Rhinu
text: Caleb Hollingsworth was extremely insightful and very helpful, I was just browsing and he still took his time and showed me around and gave me ideas for my price and needs, when I buy my vehicle they've got my business and a fan

name: maria perez
text: Caleb Hollingsworth is very knowledgeable and super nice, make sure you go see him!

name: Kim Eubanks
text: Keep up the good work Caleb Hollingsworth! Your knowledge and sales style are appreciated!

name: Gold Side
text: Super friendly staff who really gets to know their clients. Alex Sanchez was a pleasure and knowledgeable about the brand!

name: Diego Mejia
text: Top shelf. Top shelf indeed. Alex is the man!

name: Jacob Morgan
text: I have never had a bad experience there, will definitely go back again!

name: Kristen Tidwell
text: Alex was extremely helpful and we will definitely be coming back for our next vehicle!

name: Sophia Amedeo-Kingsbury
text: Great customer service and a wide variety of cars, used and new, without spending too much money!

name: Michael Thomas
text: Great place with a wide selection to choose from! Very friendly staff, ask for Alex and he'll make sure you get what you came for!

name: Catherine Mccown
text: Thankful to have found a dealership as well as a salesperson to make the car buying process less stressful. I wouldn’t dare go anywhere other than here thanks to the help of Alex Sanchez!

name: Carl Hagood
text: Quick and easy

name: Summer Stewart
text: I highly reccomend and Caleb Hollingsworth was extremely nice, professional and very Helpful!!

name: Laura Mejia
text: Great dealership, love the customer service from Alex Sanchez the most! I didn’t buy anything but if I would have it would be because of him!

name: VG Crusader
text: Awesome place for awesome deals, Alex Sanchez is THE man.

name: The Viking Gardener
text: Dink Tucker has been extremely helpful and we will be returning when needed!

name: Tracee Binion
text: Alex Sanchez is such an asset to your dealership! His friendly attitude and knowledge makes him a pleasure to work with!

name: Jarrett Nicholson
text: Excellent service as always!

name: Katie Hopper
text: Cabel Hollingsworth was very helpful

name: William Parker
text: Carlos in service is great . Awesome young man

name: Jan Mooney
text: Great service. They have fixed all my problems.

name: Michael Baker
text: Great salesman not rude very friendly

name: katy makovicka
text: Great Dealership! Friendly staff, very helpful.

name: Merle Johnson
text: Caleb was great to work with!

name: Daniel Hodges
text: Great selection and knowledgeable sales team!

name: Mike Glenn Glenn
text: Good place to buy a new Chrysler dodge Jeep or ram

name: Steven Brooks
text: I’ve worked on these cars for years and I have yet to meet a salesman who actually knows the ins and outs of them as much as Alex Sanchez. He put me in the Hellcat of my dreams and he’ll do the same for you.

name: Joseph Tidmore
text: Come see Caleb Holingsworth for all your car buying needs!

name: carlos loya
text: Best place in town for service.

name: Jerry Casey
text: Caleb was great

name: Jack Mccay
text: Was ok they need an Express oil change

name: Sabrina Dumas
text: Great dealership!

name: Harrison Powers
text: Incredible Staff!

name: Selathiel
text: Caleb Hollingsworth I

name: Allie Eason
text: Amazing people

name: StarPlatinumVG
text:
(Translated by Google) 5 stars. THIS.

(Original)
5 stars. EZ.

name: Ashley Lanningham
text: Had the best experience ever buying a truck today. Lukas was more than helpful and patient with us today. He answered all the questions, and even got three different keys in the rain for different trucks! The atmosphere here is totally different than any other car lot, they are not pressuring you in to anything and not trying to get you to drive what they want you too! They are definitely there to please the customer!

name: Jaime Pettaway
text: Absolutely amazing customer service.  I purchased an SUV that had some issues after I bought it and they made it right with no questions asked.  They even came to Birmingham to pick it up.  My salesman, Jordan was so kind and very helpful.  I 100% recommend this place to anyone.

name: BobbieJo Salyers
text: Jordan was amazing.  We usually use Carmax and avoid dealerships like the plague.  Our experience here has changed our opinion and now we have 2 options for the purchase of a used vehicle.  No pressure tactics used and the honesty was quite refreshing.  Thank you guys for a great experience and an amazing used SUV.  Top notch for sure!!  If you have not visited this place..I would highly recommend you do.

name: nathan7727
text: I found Jordan to be extremely helpful and professional, without being pushy or high pressure. He quickly chased down answers to every question I had. He kept me in the loop during the process. He looked for solutions to options that I really wanted on the vehicle they had that I liked, and that I ended up buying. And he was just plain friendly and enjoyable to work with. I would ABSOLUTELY recommend you visit him for your next used purchase. Their inventory is pretty broad, and the vehicles are in great shape! You can tell that they really work hard at selecting top notch vehicles for their lot.

name: Jeff Glenn
text: Great experience. Jordan was top-notch, very knowledgeable / friendly / prompt in his responses to questions and not a pushy salesman. Good inventory and fair deal on trade and purchase of truck. Thanks again Jordan!!

name: Wesley Stephens
text: We have purchased vehicles from other dealers in the past, and our experience with Young Motors was hands down the best by far! Moose and Jordan answered any question that I had and didnt make me feel pressured into a purchase. They have a great top notch set of inventory to choose from!!

name: Thomas Wadsworth
text: Great people awesome service fantastic cars n prices!!!

name: Madison Hamilton
text: I had a wonderful experience here! It was my first time buying a car and I was very nervous and inexperienced with car buying. Wayne did a tremendous job with helping me out and filling me in on everything I needed to know. He was able to help get my first car financed when I wasn’t able to get approved elsewhere. They have great quality cars for great prices! Be sure to ask for Wayne as he is very helpful!

name: Glen Hutchison
text:
Thoroughly enjoyed the experience! Jacey took the time to send us pictures and answer all our questions. In our situation she was able to work out the details of our trade before we even got there.
No pressure, no high fees and a very easy process.

name: Michael Jones
text: Troy, Wayne and the whole staff were great... Couldn't have asked for a better group to buy from...

name: Karen Phillips
text: The owner was very professional at helping my husband find a tire for our car, put tire on,  and was done in like 10 mins or less.  I will recommend him to anybody if they need tires.  Thank you sir

name: Shyla Hutchison
text:
What a fantastic experience!  We found this listing on facebook marketplace, but weren't able to make it out to see the vehicle for a couple of days.  It was a bit of a drive, so I had lots of questions before wanting to make the hour drive.  Jacey was super quick to respond, so knowledgeable, polite, and helpful, and answered every question I had. She also sent me lots of extra pictures since we were looking for some very specific features. She even did quite a bit of preliminary leg work on letting us know if a trade was possible (it was, and very fair, in our opinion).

Once we finally made it out she made the entire process smooth, quick, and super easy.  She even cheerfully stayed late as we couldn't make it out until close to closing time. She was beyond polite and helpful throughout the entire process.  We couldn't recommend her or Young Motors more highly!

name: Cory Smith
text: Never been more pleased with a dealership!! Awesome customer service. Never had a problem with my 2015 GMC Sierra SLT 2500. I highly recommend that you stop in and check out their inventory!!!

name: Michael Clement
text: What I had been searching for happened to be nearly 3 hours away from home but I wouldn't do a thing differently. Worth the drive, dealer was honest about what to expect before I made the drive and I would definitely buy another vehicle from them. Good folks. Thank you!

name: Maggie Darnell
text: Nice lot, just didnt have what we were looking for

name: Dalton Jacobs
text: Sold me a truck with some issues and never fixed the problem... was in their shop twice for over a week each time.... hard to get in touch with owner/boss. Wouldn't recommend this place to anyone. Horrible visit. Truck is currently parked because of the issues. Older guy there is a rude as hell..

name: Kelly Grider
text: Went here on a Saturday afternoon for a truck I had been looking at on their website for a couple weeks. Had all intentions of trading my brand new Jeep for a powerstroke they had.. that was until I went to ask to test drive and older man working inside told us "Sorry we don't do joy rides. You can only drive them when you've got all your finances with you and ready to buy." Oh? I wasn't aware that's how car buying works. Yeah I bet I do go to purchase before I've even sat in the damn vehicle. Ridiculous.... and rude! Can't believe that's how they treat customers walking around looking at 40,000 dollar trucks. Lost our business instantly. 👋🏼👋🏼👋🏼

name: Wendy Uhlman
text: Great customer service 👍👌👍...

name: Stallion 33
text: I sat in their lobby.  No one talked to me . But that's cool.

name: lurch sawman
text: Cash only  or you better get your own bank loans

name: Sean Chastain
text: Super friendly people willing to find us the exact vehicle we are looking for. Go the extra mile. Thanks

name: Stinson Smith
text: Best place around  by far to do business with

name: james wilson
text: Great cars great service.If you are looking for a truck I promise you they will have it

name: JUMPKN 83
text: Good quality vehicles and costumer service that cares about you and your needs

name: judi Ward
text: Always a good deal there

name: Jake Elwood
text: Great place friendly staff

name: Carl Black
text: Brown headed bimbo that works there is impossible to get in touch with! Tried emailing and calling about pricing for a Jeep several times with no answer. Can’t believe this place is still runnin. What happened to customer service?

name: James Wilson
text: Awesome vehicles and great customer satisfaction

name: cindy pruitt
text: Didn't think I was worthy enough for help

name: Kimbernjohn Bruce
text: Good people

name: R B
text: Menace to community

name: Jay Johnson
text: Awesome shop with awesome products.  Whats even better is the office staff... SJ is the bomb.  She answered my questions, and the ones she didn't know, she got answers for! If you want to take your jeep to the next level and want to do it with people that care... Call Motobilt. You can look down at my reviews and notice I don't take the time to pass out reviews unless the are 100% deserved.

resp.text: Awesome thank you Jay. SJ is a great asset to our company for sure!

name: Scout Bywater
text: These Well built parts are definitely worth the money. Im going through this company for parts from now on.

name: Ed Geleski
text: Great company w. awesome products for Jeep JL 2018 fits well and looks good!

name: Richard LaFleur
text: Great but where can I get one of the Motobilt hats?

name: Deborah Isler Mercer
text: I just bought my first Jeep and I'm in the process of doing a few things to it. I told Bobby kind of what I was wanting and he showed me several options. I just picked it up this afternoon, it looks awesome!! Great customer service too! 😀

resp.text: Thank you for the business.  We are here to assist with anything you may need

name: HELIMOTO
text: Outstanding service. They always kept me up to date on my Jeep. They were extremely knowledgeable on Jeeps and what I should expect for certain mods. I'll be back for sure.

resp.text: Thank you for the review.  Let us know if we can ever help with anything.

name: Jeffrey Spellman
text: Customer service is second to none, they go way above and beyond to please the customer. Not to mention their craftsmanship is impeccable.

name: Summer Black
text: Great American made products. One of the best around!! Would recommend them to anyone!

resp.text: Thanks Summer!!! Let us know if you need anything.

name: SimbaJKU
text: Great shop for all your automotive needs. Jon and his staff of assassin's know how to turn your mail crawler into a fully capable monster

name: Joshua Williams
text: Best in the business!!  Great customer service and even better prices!!  Highly recommend and everyone should also check out the website!!!!

name: tim Martz
text: Called 6 times over 3 weeks to have front and rear gears installed in truck.. Talked to same lady every time.  Keeps "forgetting" to call me back with prices.. Really thinking now they cant handle it.

name: swingingforfences swingingforfences
text: Excellent place for parts and service

name: Steven Hoff (Gigabyte)
text: Did a great job balancing my wheels for me. Great service and knowledge there.

name: Danny Brittian
text: I have reached out to this place numerous Times to get work done and they always tell me they are too busy and suggest somewhere else to do business. They were very rude and act as though they do not want to support the community in which they should want to serve.

resp.text: What were you wanting to get done?  I know currently we are booking about two weeks out on service work.

name: Scotty Lovelady
text: Jon and his team are top notch!

name: Chase Stephens
text: Great people, Great variety, Great Patience. Chris, Jeff, and Jon all shared their wealth of knowledge and insight. Top notch guys that do top notch work! Projects big or small this is the place to go. I’ve taken both my truck and Jeep for different things, extremely pleased with everything I’ve had done. If they don’t have what you want in stock, they will work to get it. Check out some of their builds.... they speak for themselves.

name: Clifton Bailey
text: They didn't act like they wanted my business.

resp.text: Im the owner of Rpmextreme. Was there something you needed? I never want any customers to feel like we didn't want their business. As a small business owner its important to me to be sure all my customers feel like they received a higher quality experience.

name: Curt Dusterhoff
text: Tried for over a month to get an estimate on an ls swap in my lj.  Never could get an estimate.  Didnt seem like they wanted my business so I just gave up.

name: Tim Brewis
text: RPM installed my goose neck hitch.  Did a great job at a competitive price.  Turnaround was quick.  I would use them again.

name: Shelby Renner
text: I drive all the way there from southern Illinois for a motor swap in my jeep, a 5.3. It only took about a week for them to get the job done, while they had many other projects going. My jeep runs perfect and is badass now thanks to RPM extreme!!!

name: Robert Wrinkle
text: Good food always and nice people who work thr and ry

name: Mount Zion Offroad
text: These guys are great!  They helped me with a HEMI JK Computer problem.  They were quick, friendly and willing to help!

name: Jason Jones
text: Jon tuned my 2013 JK on his trip to California. Thanks for taking the time out of your busy schedule!  It was easy and he was fast. Fixed my 3-4 shift and gave me more gains than I can list.  Loaded my Flash Paq 87 tune and it drives better than new!  Can't wait to try the other tunes. Thanks again! Highly recommend if you are having the same problem  with your JK when driving uphill.

resp.text: We love helping where we can.

name: Darrell Heimann
text: Have the upmost respect for the very professional staff at this business. Very knowledgeable about Jeep's and are willing to listen to and address your requirements.

name: S Hurley (Grayhemi16)
text: Not just for jeeps. Had them install some relocation brackets on my lowered ram 1500, did great work and at a very good price.

resp.text: Yes its true we do more than just Jeeps. We have a lot of experienced techs in the back and they love a challenge.

name: Robert Thompson
text: Very knowledgeable

name: Jadine Dasinger
text: I will tell you! That the Jackson Al office will take care of you! Me and my husband are very pleased with our New 2021 Dodge Ram 2500 just what we needed. Thanks to Andrew Nichols and Shawn Sinnott. They went above and beyond to get us the best deal possible and warranties. Even though they were getting ready to close at 5pm they stayed and continued to help us until we got it finished with no problems they took their time and made sure everything was done correctly and that we were well taken care of. They make sure you have something to drink and all kinds of snacks as well. I give them a perfect 10. I will come here and send anyone I know to them because I know they will be taken good care of.

name: Tiffany Taylor
text: I’ve now taken three different vehicles to Jason Pilger in Jackson, and I’ve never had a bad experience. The ladies in the office are super nice and one of the guys in the back even offered to stay late so I could  get my car back sooner! It wasn’t necessary, but not many people would offer that. Our family will definitely return!

name: Krista Gimbel
text:
Andrew was very informative and charismatic!
He's an awesome salesman. And I'm in love with my new 2009 Chevy Tahoe. Its the perfect family vehicle. Thank you Andrew and Mathew who got us an affordable note!

name: Linda Craft
text: Awesome sales team. No pressure. We knew what we wanted and were willing to pay. Very hospitable.

name: Lori Williams
text: Hey Guys! Looking for an awesome customer service and great deals go to Jason Pilger!! That's where it's at! Ask for Andrew hes a great salesman and knows his job Very Well thank you to everyone who helped me purchase my first car own my own nobody But God!

name: Helena R
text: HONESTLY, this place doesn't deserve one star! I will NEVER take another vehicle there for service/repairs. They diagnose the issues and supposedly repaired them and my vehicle is displaying the same messages. It won't shut off, $1768 later! They told me they don't know what the issue is and refuse to refund my money. They offered to sell me another vehicle...THEY COULD NEVER get another dime. This is clearly THEFT BY DECEPTION!!!!!

name: Chad Morgan
text: Andrew was a fantastic salesperson and easy to deal with. The entire staff made the purchase easy and painless!! Highly Recommend!!

name: Michelle Dixon
text: My labor was way more than the cost of my parts but the staff is nice and helpful.

name: Andy Wilson
text: Jason Pilger was great. Andrew was curteous and went above and beyond to make a deal happen. Shoutout to Matthew for assisting and working some magic.

name: Austin Croxton
text: The sales Team at Jason Pilger dodge in Jackson Alabama was the Friendlist and Honest dealership I've ever dealt with the Sales guy Andrew Nichols was a very friendly and knowledgeable guy

name: Jarol Rodgers
text: Dee was a great help, she got us in the car that we wanted and it wasn't a hassle I would recommend this dealership and make sure you ask for Dee!

name: Miracle Hudson
text: As soon as me and my husband came to look dee came and helped us. She took her time and worked with us to get the car that we wanted! We Got it! Thanks to Dee Daffin! This dealership is Highly recommended!

name: Jennifer Newton
text: Had a really nice salesman, Shawn Sinnot, they didn't seem to be pushy about trying to make you pick and buy. Really nice.

resp.text: Thank you so much ma'am.  Pushy is not the Jason Pilger way.  We are respectful and helpful throughout the process.  I am very happy you had such a good experience here with us and hope to see you again soon.

name: Charlie Arnold
text: Not your average dealership! Great team there putting safety first! I had a wonderful  experience with Gabe, he was very personable and for the first time it felt like I had someone to help me find the perfect car for me, instead of being told what car they want me to purchase. Incredibly helpful and he got me a great price! 10/10 recommend!

name: Chauncy Bolden
text: I want to thank Jason pilgrims for taking very good care of my truck. They done a awesome job.

name: Cam Mitchell
text: Best experience at a dealership! Gabe was very helpful in finding a car that fit perfect for me and my family. Very respectful and knowledgeable, definitely would recommend if you're looking to purchase a vehicle. Loving my new ride so far; it's extremely reliable and the price was not anywhere close to as high as I would have payed at other dealers.

name: Katie Parker
text: This is the best dealership. Dee was and is still amazing. She made purchasing my new Jeep so easy and such a smooth transaction. She still keeps in touch with me to make sure I am still enjoying my Jeep and to see if there is anything I need. Highly recommend this dealership and Dee!!

name: Ashley Clift
text: Amazing dealership and I cannot say enough great things about Gabe! He was so friendly and personable, and really made the process of purchasing a car so easy and stress free! I felt like he was really listening to me and cared about my wants and needs. I would recommend him to anyone!!!

name: Michael Brons
text: Took my wife’s Chrysler 300C (2010) to find and fix source of slow coolant leak and to flush the coolant system. Arrived just before 7:30 Monday morning. A young man employed by the dealership was waiting to go in and start his day, he was very friendly and helpful. I was preparing to leave the key when the Service Manager arrived. He was also very friendly. I explained the problem and symptoms. He explained that the symptoms sound like a water pump issue. I received a call a few hours later confirming the water pump. Price was much less than I was prepared for so I quickly authorized the repair. Wednesday morning Service Manager called to report repairs were complete and they would be delivering the car (we live in Monroeville) in the afternoon. From the outset they were friendly, efficient, straightforward and struck me as trustworthy. We will definitely be back for any necessary repairs. Extremely well done!  Thank you!

name: Luis D'Jesus
text: I had taken my jeep to 3 different dealership prior to Jason Pilger CJDR and none were able to figure out what was wrong with it. No only were they able to determine the issue and fit it the first time, but they picked up the car from my house and brought it back after at no additional cost..

name: Alex Viola
text: Ask for Dee! She was attentive, responsive, and very helpful. She's also very knowledgeable and made you feel right at home. The dealership itself has a great staff and people that are willing to help you and make deals. My wife and I are very happy with the truck we purchased and would certainly recommend this dealership to friends in the future. Thanks Jason Pilger CDJR!!!

name: lexi rodriguez
text: Great dealership! Lots of great people! My specific salesman was Gabe and he was wonderful! Answered all my questions, showed me a ton of options for me, and got me a great price! Highly recommend!

name: Sherry Jordan
text: I took my truck in to have the computer module replaced and programmed. Everyone there were super nice and let us know exactly what was going on with my truck. I will definently use Jason Pilger CDJ again and will reccomend to anyone.

name: Charles Skelton
text: Don't waste your time here . I don't like to do bad reviews , but I can not recommend this this place.

name: Princess Butler
text:
Couldn't ask for a better experience.  My sales rep Dee, was very knowledgeable had an answer for all of my questions. She was able to take my information via the phone and within minutes I was approved. There were NO PRESSURE tactics used (I greatly appreciate that). A few hours later I had driven from Prattville, Alabama to Jackson, Alabama to finalize the paperwork and drive back home in my vehicle!!
~Sincerely Princess Butler

name: David Dolbear
text: The employees at Jason Pilger have always treated with utmost respect every time I have been involved with this car dealership and have always been very satisfied with them. I would like to thank them for the experience I have had.

name: Jordin Holmes
text: Just got a new car here. Everyone here was so kind and helpful! Gabe really stood out when he helped me look for my new car! Very happy with my experience. If you’re looking for a vehicle, I recommend coming here!

name: SHELIDA ABSTON
text: Professional & the service department treated me with very courteous & personal service!

name: james king
text: Just wanted to say what a pleasure it was to deal with this dealership. I drove 2.5 hours to do business with them and wouldn't hesitate to do it again tomorrow. My salesman was Cory Winston and he was very attentive, thorough and not pushy at all during the whole process. Small town dealership with a great staff. Very happy with my new Ram 2500.

name: miriam hernandez
text: I had a great experience with my salesman Gabe, he’s really helpful and super knowledgeable. I definitely recommend coming here!

name: Shannon Richardson
text: Dee was super helpful and informative with the buying process. I recommend anyone to visit and see what she can do for you if you are in the market for a vehicle. Ask for Dee.

name: Deana Keith
text: To long and difficult to go into .

name: Trini Arce
text: I was in the area and decided on a whim to stop by. I had a great experience. Gabe helped me and was able to answer all my questions even though I was only looking as this point.

name: Taylor Chandler
text: Excellent customer care! I spoke with one employee, Dee Daffin and she was excellent! I loved my experience with them, and she made it even better!

name: Amorous Arce
text: Gabe helped me out and didn’t make me feel bad about not knowing what I wanted.  He wa a really nice and knowledgeable guy.

name: Jaylin Jones
text: If you are looking for great deals and a friendly staff go shop at Jason Pilger CDJR and make sure you ask for Dee Daffin. She was so friendly. Go shop there if you are looking for a car.

name: Charlene Council

name: Brown Sugar
text: I recently visited this lot and was met by a salesperson by the name of Dee. I wasnt looking for any vehicle in particular just something that i could drive for work. Dee showed me a vehicle that I instantly fell in love with. Ask for Dee she was very helpful!

name: kids YouTube channel thanks for watching
text: I enjoyed the great customer service!! The team made me feel special and comfortable with the decision I made. Since then I have recommended several people to stop be and give Jason Pilger a try!!

name: Vanessa Darrington
text: I called up there and asked for Dee and I must say she answered everything I wanted to know about getting a vehicle and I would recommend her to anyone. She's a great salesperson.

name: Travis Taite
text: Really enjoy the process of getting a car from here. It was quick and easy and the staff was great . Thanks again to Dee Daffin . I highly recommend anyone to working with her she’s the best and knows her stuff!

text: Was greeted and immediately welcomed upon visiting the cone shop. Asked for Dee and she was very professional, courteous, and went above & beyond!

name: Kimberly Hunt
text: Andrew Nichlos was great with everything!!

name: Taylor Puett
text: I was an out-of-state customer purchasing from GA. I worked with Dee Daffin, and she made the entire purchase process SO simple. I have never purchased a vehicle from a dealer out-of-state,  but she walked me through the process. It was actually easier than walking into a dealer! We worked out a deal Monday, and I had my new vehicle delivered Tuesday at noon!

name: Bryan Lowe
text: Bought my new 2020 Ram and this place worked to get me where we needed to be. After talking to several dealerships about the same vehicle, this dealership worked to make it happen. Brandon even got me in and out without having to wait hours on end like other dealerships do. Best experience I've had at a dealership ever. Great crew!!

name: toni Holmes
text: I would like to brag on your employee Gabe Rodriguez! So helpful and polite and answered all of my questions! Thank you Gabe!!

name: Michelle Lee
text: Such a great experience, everyone was super helpful, especially Gabe. He was super polite and knowledgeable. I would definitely recommend coming here for future vehicles!

name: Abigail Butcher
text: Gabe definitely stood out. was very helpful and was super knowledgeable on all the vehicles i was interested in.

text: I always shopped outside of Clarke County for vehicle, but now I will always shop with Jason Pilger. One salesman in particular was extremely nice and informative. Issac Welch is courteous, knowledgeable, and not pushy. Jason Pilger will always get my family's business!!

name: Hailey Carter
text: very impressed with your employee gabe rodriguez! answered all of my questions, very polite, and would definitely recommend anyone to see him!

text: y'all quit playing around and go see the team of Jason Pilger CDJR! they are literally the friendliest, most helpful, and caring people to assist with your car purchasing experience. ask for DEE DAFFIN in particular and she'll get you exactly what you came for!!!

name: J S
text: These guys are very professional. Delivered my 19 ram 2500 to me over 45 minutes away. No charge to me at all.  Paul mckeever worked on my numbers for me. Caleb was my finance guy. I was in and out in minutes.  And I didn’t even have to haggle. Hell of a price. These guys are great people. If your looking for a truck. This is the place to go. Thanks guys!

name: Kayla Mitchell
text: Gabe is fantastic! Great representation of the staff as a whole. Five stars all around.

name: Jasmine Brown
text: I spoke with Dee and she answered any questions I had, she also made sure I understood the process I recommend Jason Pilger CDJR and make sure you ask for Dee she is the best

name: Shana Wideman
text: Just bought a brand new Jeep. Issac Welch was my salesman and Brandon Benton was my finance guy. They were both excellent and would recommend them to everyone. Great job guys, Thank you.

name: Paul Bishop
text: I was visiting from Birmingham and a battery light came on during my trip. I called to see if the service team could inspect the vehicle before my 3 hour and 15 minute drive back home. They found a simple problem ( my son replaced the battery) and had me on the road in minutes. The lady at the service desk that took my call prior to arrival also checked in my vehicle and entered vin and customer info. She was very professional and friendly. Great Service experience! Thank you!!!!!

name: Jasmine Montgomery

text: What a joke bought a car from them and was out of state had to do all the paper work for them one problem after another poorly run sales staff car was delivered and was not even detailed no way to conduct business did not even send a tag with the driver for my trade had to send him back with my tag  charged me doc fees and I did most of the documents  in Florida just too bad cant leave negative  stars

text: Go by Jason Pigler ‘s dealership and ask for Dee Daffin!! I promise you that you won’t be disappointed!! Great customer service!!! Shout OUT to Dee Daffin!! Keep up the great work!

text: Losing coolant. Already had in shop for sensor which cost over 200.00. Really bad rusted underneath from salt covered highway in New York.  Would not have purchased vechicle if you would have been more upfront about the problems. Would have waited until you got another one in. Very concerned about the coolant problem.

Jason Pilger

text: Issac Welch, was an awesome  sell representative. He help make purchasing  a car easy for buying  a graduation  present for my Daughter.

text: Loving my 2019 Ram, awesome, easy, and FAST transaction at a great price. Clay was excellent to work with. Highly recommended!

text: Service Department has always been courteous & thorough. I’ve used them since 2008 & never had a negative experience.

name: Stephanie's Super Cars
text: Wonderful sales & service teams, & great prices

name: Rhonda Goldman
text: No one came out to help me!

name: Lamarr Charleston
text: Issac Welch is an awesome car salesman!!!

name: Crystal Miller
text: I went to have an oil change, they were fast and friendly.

name: Chris Horn
text: I had a great experience And Cory is awesome!!!!

name: joel james
text: Mad appointment one week in advance for a tailgate recall and my last free oil change

name: Vanessa Phillips
text: My Jeep was not fixed after paying 1200.00 . The same problem that I took it in for a broke down in the same place . Was told to bring it back never offered to send a wrecker. Tell me how I’m supposed to bring it in when it won’t run!!!

name: Robert Reeves
text: They do a great job.

name: Lori Stout
text: Great people and great service

name: Larry Harkless Sr
text: Convenient

name: Jim DuFriend
text: Fast, friendly, professional.

name: Eugene Javion Snowden Snowden
text: Fair fast concern

name: Betty Autry
text: Great

name: Josef Murph
text: Great service

name: Ben Flowers
text: These guys are great. It's all about the customer. Very pleasant buying experience. The good Lord has blessed me in finding Jason Pilger CDJR. I will be traveling the 3 hrs for service just to have my Gladiator serviced there.

name: Aaron Ryals
text: I purchased a brand new vehicle from them April 29th. The service until the sell was made was nothing short of phenomenal. However, it ended there. It’s now been 5 weeks and they still haven’t sent my paperwork to my county for me to be able to purchase my tag. My wife and I have called multiple times and we get the same response. We will check and call you back. Guess what....no one ever calls back. I’m completely frustrated and have received warnings for no tag, so I now have a vehicle I can’t drive because I’m way beyond my 10 business days to have a tag. I recommend you shop somewhere else. I should have paid more and purchased local.

name: Mohammed ALKhateeb
text: Love the service,  love the cars and every one friendly!

name: tina morgan
text:
We purchased a renegade from Mikail. He was very helpful and made it a very easy purchase.
The entire staff also made us feel welcome which we’ve had bad experiences at other dealerships. We will definitely buy from them again! Thank you Mikail!

name: A. Mck80
text: My experience at Autonation was awesome. My service advisor was Jason Williams and he saw to it that I had awesome service. Not only did he greet me when I drove up to the service center, but he made sure I had beverages to drink, he checked in with frequently to keep me informed of the progress they were making on automobile, and he saw to it that I received the services I requested and I received them in a timely manner. He was absolutely awesome and I will come back again.

name: LaToya B
text: This place was the absolute worse place I ever been to for car repair service. They were very unprofessional. They lied to me and told me my services would be covered under warranty. They said they called and then told me later warranty was not covering. My car went into the shop running and was there for 3 weeks. When I tried to go get it now they are saying it needs a whole new motor. It was so many levels to this, but I would never in my life ever buy a Dodge and I will never go to that dealership again. Everyone that work there is a complete joke.

name: Christopher Peters
text: They have trouble wearing masks correctly. Also, the Service department treats customers like an after thought.

name: jan vickers
text: automation is awesome! they bought my vehicle and found the exact suv I wanted!! Alexis was so sweet, and oh so helpful!

name: Jackie Camp
text: When my 2014 Chrysler 200 needs service I take it to AutoNation because they are professional and they check everything to make sure no issues arise.  When it's going to be a long wait they come and let you know were they are on each step of repair.  They always have coffee and water if needed.  They also check on recall parts so you want have to come back they fix it doing your service visit.  They always offer other discounts on oil changes, tires and other necessities.  I wouldn't take my Chrysler anywhere else.

name: Matt Montenegro
text: Some of the most sleezy people that give all car sales men a bad name. Purchased a used vehicle from this dealership in May of 2020. I was sold when I was told that my vehicle had an Auto Nation warranty of "90 days or 4,000 miles." Sounds great doesn't it? Well after being hurried along in signing paperwork so the vehicle could be mine I was very happy with my purchase. However, less than a month later, and still well within my "warranty" coverage period I got a Christmas tree of lights on my dashboard. I was told to take it to its dealership and from there I could then make the claim. When I called to make the claim, Auto Nation's warranty service said there was no vehicle with my VIN in the system. I then called the manager there who told me, "I never signed any contract stating I had a warranty and it doesn't matter what I was told because it isn't in writing." I realized the manager was right about this however, I was being told one thing then they intentionally rushed me through signing paperwork so that I wouldn't catch that I never signed anything for my "warranty". The deceptive methods of these people shows that they are talented at one thing and, one thing only and, that is lying to people. These people are clearly slimy and cannot be trusted, save yourself the hassle and do not purchase a vehicle from here. Learn from my mistake, don't come here. Where ever you do go, whatever you are offered make sure it is in writing!!!!

name: William Mott
text: The two service advisors I usually deal with are Michael Robinson and Ken Baker; they are always friendly and helpful. I dropped off my truck for service (oil change, tire rotation, etc.) and Ken Baker called back to notify me that my vehicle was ready. As far I know, the work was done satisfactorily.

name: Charles Bailey
text: I’ve never had any problems with them. Good quality work on time. They’ll tell you if something else needs to be looked at.

name: Samantha Stefan
text: I have purchased 3 Vehicles from this Dealership with my Husband and have had the same salesman Austyn ! He is Humble and Honest and that means a lot these days when purchasing a vehicle. They met my expectations and we will continue to buy from here as long as he is there. The best experiences I have ever had at any Dealership and I have bought many vehicles in my lifetime!!! Thank you Austyn you Rock !!!

name: Alfonso Packer
text: Consumer service was very poor. Upon arrival to pick up my car after recall work I had to stand in the lobby for 20mins before I was even acknowledged to get help. Then the service guy who said he had my paper so he would him me continued a phone call for an additional 30 mins. It didn’t bother me until I heard the conversation, which seemed personal not AutoNation business related, so I decided to go to parts while I waited to get so things. That department was great. After finishing up he still was on phone so I went to someone else to see if I could be helped then he decided to pull up my paperwork and noticed it was a recall job and only need a signature and to hand me my keys. I will never probably use the service department if that was a example of the customer service to expect.

name: Richard Dodson
text: Had some warranty work done on my 2019 Ram 1500. Troy was very knowledgeable of what needed to be done, and the service technicians did a great with the small issues that had, andchad my truck ready to go in a timely manner. Great job Autonation team.

name: Ms. Kay
text: Great service team. Ken was extremely patient throughout the journey. I experienced some flood damage in September 2019 that required major repairs to include a rental for a few weeks. Updates were offered and a complete thorough summary of what was serviced. Ken and the team wereprofessional. My vehicle was as showroom ready as the day I purchased it from them. Roll Tide.

name: Daijha Doss
text: NONE of my experiences at autonation have been pleasant. I’m either here all day or have to leave my car for days at a time because they can’t seem to do their jobs. My car was there for 2 days just to get the battery changed (I kid you not). Now I’m waiting on a part for my car and dear lord you would think they had to actually build the part themselves. I’ve been told 3 different stories about this part. I’ve had my car for almost 4 years now and EVERY SINGLE TIME I’m in there someone is upset about how they run this place. Now I’m that someone. Thanks for nothing Autonation. Keep up the good work.

name: Rick McNeill
text: I have dealt with Tommy Johnson on multiple occasions and he has always been courteous and professional.

name: Amir Sahori
text: Very unprofessional staff. 7 hour oil change while I was stuck at the mall. No service or anyone to help get me anywhere. Was given a call 20 min before closing time and said that my ride was ready, got there 40 min later due to traffic and they said they closed. So honestly never doing business with this dealership ever again. I suggest everyone get oil changes at Honda rather than this dealership... buy your cars somewhere else, the bad service outweighs the quality of their trucks.

name: Samuel Alston IV
text: I was completely satisfied with the Service Advisor, Mike Robinson’s eagerness and prompt service to my problem. I definitely enjoyed the awesome service. I will recommend him to friends and colleagues. Also, Autonation as somewhere to go for all their car related needs.

name: Janet Wright
text:
Great company, great atmosphere, and it was awesome working with Chris and Austin
They made us feel at easy and comfortable
My husband and I would definitely do business with this company again
Thanks guys

name: Natalia Hornbuckle
text: Great experience from beginning to end!!! Salesman (Sondra) not overbearing, very professional, cordial and kind. Ralph in Finance great personality. Wonderful experience.

name: Scott Boyd
text: The staff there worked out a great deal for me on my purchase of a 2020 Jeep Wrangler Unlimited Rubicon.

name: Dana Adcock
text: 10 years ago we bought a new Jeep Grand Cherokee.   No one has ever touched this car but Auto Nation.  A couple months age my husband took the car in for repair.  A new condenser had to be installed.  After the work was completed, when we picked the car up, the dash lights were out.   We were told there would be an additional $300 or more to fix it.  This was very shabby business as it was fine before the work was done.   I’ve had a couple of issues with this establishment but let it go but this is going to far to expect us to pay for something that was broken while a very expensive repair was being done on the car.

name: Daniel Eisrnhard
text: Sid was very helpful throughout the whole process of repairing my wife’s vehicle through the extended warranty.  He spent time on the phone dealing with my warranty company and when it came time he even drove me in his own vehicle to the rental company.

name: Diane Krause
text: I took my car in for repair of the power adjustment on the driver seat. The service rep who took care of me made the scheduling and check-in nice and easy and arranged for the shuttle service to take me home. I was disappointed that the AutoNation website didn't allow me to schedule an appointment for repairs online (only maintenance services could be done online). I got a diagnosis and repair quote within a day, but word that it would take a week to get the part in. It turned out to be an additional day for the part to arrive, and I was told the car would be done the following day, but  it took two more days for it to get done. We came from the Houston area where we were used to parts being accessible more quickly, so this wait time may be normal for the Mobile area. The pickup experience was a bit frustrating. I picked up on a Saturday and waited 1 hour 15 minutes to get checked out (was told the car was ready but paperwork had to be done). The service rep kept getting pulled away by walk-ins, phone calls, and I'm not sure what else, but it seemed I kept getting bumped to the back of the line. There may have been more legitimate reasons for the long wait time, but those weren't shared with me. Everyone was nice and helpful, and my car was repaired, but the wait times were a bit disappointing.

name: And P
text: Parts department is a joke. Spent 10 minutes going in circles trying to reach someone there. Eventually just hangup.

name: Cinde Pocase
text: I recently had a recall taken care of on my Jeep Renegade at Auto Nation Jeep in Mobile.  Troy took care of setting up my appointment and getting the repair done. They always do a great job there and take care of me and my car.

name: Darla Wheeler
text: Awesome experience!!! Austyn Long gave us great service. We are very happy with our purchase and will be going there if we need anything in the future.

name: Michael Harris
text: Service was good Michael was good at explaining what I needed. Not sure if I needed all of what I got,but overall I was satisfied.

name: Mr. A.D.
text: Ron did a awsome job getting me in and out fast. He also explained a lot of things I didn't know that I could get for my vehicle.

name: Clausell Huff
text: GREAT SERVICE VERY CLEAN QUALITY VALUE GREAT. THANK YOU

name: Will Powell
text: Shamarcus Mack did his job well as the salesman and was very helpful and friendly. I recommend him completely but AutoNation as a whole, not so much. I bought a car from there on August 26th. I paid cash and was told that I would have the paperwork for the title and so I could get my tag, in about 10 days but to allow 20. It’s weird to me that I didn’t get the title that day but now it has been a month and I still don’t have the paperwork. I’m still driving around with no tag, just the temp tag.

name: John Boy Gordon
text: I WORK THERE

name: Scott Ford
text: I drove about an hour away from home to sell my car to Autonation because they were willing to give me substantially more than other car buying services.  To be realistic the price was still under the book value for the vehicle, but no messing around, just a reliable sale.  I would say from the time I drove in to the time I left with a check was less than an hour and they gave me 50% more than what Carmax offered.  Karen in the online department was great to sit with while the service guys did a quick inspection and prepared the paperwork and check.  If you're looking to sell a vehicle and don't want to mess with CL or haggle with another dealer, autonation was great for me.

name: Tomecia Watts
text: I had the best experience ever. I went in to purchase one vehicle and walked out with 2 new vehicles. I'm very excited about my purchases and I would highly reccomend my salesperson Mykel. Charlie also made the experience  wonderful as well.

name: ADDIE LAWSON
text: I love this place!  I have a 2018 Jeep Wrangler and I took it in for service early in the morning.  I had questions on the transmission and they checked that too.  Wonderful service department!

name: Dwayne Bartley
text: Great service fast and reliable.  Wide selection of vehicles. Had to take a star off because they dont have the slushy machine no more. Bring it back.

name: NinjaSky012
text: The customer service is fantastic, I bought my car from there last year with the gold warranty & everything has been awesome. A++++

name: Mark Maxwell
text: The staff were great and answered all our questions. Our sales person, Austyyn, was professional, friendly and never pushy.  If you are looking for a vehicle, I would absolutely recommend AutoNation Chrysler Dodge Jeep Ram Mobile.

name: NinjaSky012
text: The customer service is fantastic, I bought my car from there last year with the gold warranty & everything has been awesome. A++++

name: Chloey Williams
text: Kel really helped us out and made our experience wonderful!

name: Frantrice Caine
text: Mike Cejka at Autonation helped me tremendously! I came into Autonation with a very bad feeling of being taken advantage of bc i am a female, but after 2 tries and 4 days Mike made sure to get everything handled and me satisfied. Not sure if I'd give Autonation a thumbs up BUT I'd definitely give Mr. Cejka 2 thumbs up..

name: Jeremy Davis
text: AutoNation made buying my Jeep quick and easy! They take the pain and dread out of buying a vehicle. I would highly recommend them to anyone!

name: Malcolm McLellan
text: The service representative was extremely professional and patient. Superb customer service!

name: Tommy Johnson
text: Talk to Troy or Ron and you will have the best service experience in mobile

name: Dynasti Greene
text: I just purchased my first car from AutoNation and I have to say Mikail did an excellent job. Quick, fast, and simple. It was truly a unique experience. He managed to get me a 2017 Chevy Cruze when I was afraid I wasn't going to be approved for a car let alone a new one. Go to him with all your vehicle needs.

name: Mauryce Thomas
text: Good Service by Mike on 2018 Dodge Ram for M. Griffin

name: Sean Patrick
text: Everyone there, was extremely nice,, Tommy is a great salesman in my book, .

name: CHELSEA DUNNEL
text: I agree with dominic they never answer the phone.  Horrible customer service

name: Bigpoppy 0331
text: Only rating this a 5 because of Ken in the service department he is very friendly ... but overall this place needs to get it together.  Trying to get someone on the phone is damn near impossible especially if it almost quitting  time.   They forgot to put the cap back on my car from the oil chase and almost caught fire.

name: Michael Ramage
text: Fast service! Friendly folks!!

name: Dominic Morrissette
text: The service department is very rude and wont answer the phone

name: Will Payne
text: Great place did exactly what I needed

name: Paul Vickers
text: Great service

name: Yolanda Curry
text: Everyone was nice and very helpful

name: Chris Heth
text: Dont know yet haven't received final bill.

name: M&K 4 Life
text: They are slow as hell. They don't answer their phones you call and call.

name: Alan Baker
text: Very satisfied

name: Constance Martin
text: Great service

name: Alan Baker
text: Very satisfied

name: Aaron Riggins
text: Bad management

name: mario tunstall
text: Thanks for the service
